bug.author: wrathagom
bug.summary: Docker Run Error about config file
bug.description:
Describe the bug When I copy/paste the command from your README for running in Docker I get an error. The full terminal output is shown below: <denchmark-code>~/Projects â–¶ docker run --rm -p 8200:8200 heartexlabs/label-studio:latest Unable to find image 'heartexlabs/label-studio:latest' locally latest: Pulling from heartexlabs/label-studio bc51dd8edc1b: Pull complete dc4aa7361f66: Pull complete 0b69bf5f8bd1: Pull complete 79b36be36783: Pull complete c1943469abb7: Pull complete 2e46d6f10a1d: Pull complete 4bda89854ec2: Pull complete 0fbb9bd3d7e7: Pull complete 583f63add2aa: Pull complete 9e393c9d9c90: Pull complete f2d7580c8609: Pull complete Digest: sha256:b34c9a030602ed6f71322c22e32451007ebcc0357a6a43cb7587091842108abb Status: Downloaded newer image for heartexlabs/label-studio:latest Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/local/bin/label-studio", line 11, in <module> load_entry_point('label-studio', 'console_scripts', 'label-studio')() File "/label-studio/label_studio/server.py", line 642, in main Project.create_project_dir(input_args.project_name, input_args) File "/label-studio/label_studio/project.py", line 482, in create_project_dir already_exists_error('label config', config_xml_path) File "/label-studio/label_studio/project.py", line 468, in already_exists_error path=path, what=what RuntimeError: ./my_project/config.xml label config already exists. Use "--force" option to recreate it. </denchmark-code>
Expected behavior I was kind of hoping it would just work. Environment (please complete the following information):
OS: Mac OS Catalina Docker version in below screenshot
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1779894/75212038-b17eca00-5753-11ea-93aa-4914f4644a72.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
Hi, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wrathagom>@wrathagom</denchmark-link> ! Thanks reporting this. Consider overriding default docker command, e.g. by running <denchmark-code>docker run --rm -p 8200:8200 heartexlabs/label-studio:latest label-studio start my_project --init --force </denchmark-code>
meanwhile we'll update default docker command & docs Upd: I've updated the instructions about docker <denchmark-link:https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio#run-docker>https://github.com/heartexlabs/label-studio#run-docker</denchmark-link>
